Madame Callista Chapola-Chimombo (Callista Mutharika) (amụrụ ya na 24 Mee n’afo 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo Malawi na nwunye di ya nke Onye isi ala Bingu wa Mutharika
O jere ozi dịka First Lady nke Republic of Malawi site na afo 2010 ruo afo 2012
Chimombo bụ onye otu Cabinet nke obodo Malawi dịka onye nhazi mba nke ahụike nne, nwa ọhụrụ na nwa na HIV / nri na-edozi ahụ / ịba ya na ụkwara nta.
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka Kọmishọna Ukwu nke obodo Malawi na Republik nke Kenya, o nyere onye isi ala Kenya asambodo ya na 1 Eprel n’ afo 2022
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye otu Pan-African Parliament, yana dịka Minista Malawi nke Njem, Anụ Ọhịa na Ọdịbendị.
Ka ọ na-erute afọ 2005, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Malawi Women's Caucus. Chimombo bụbu onye otu Democratic Progressive Party na onye bụbu onye otu nke ndi United Democratic Front (UDF).
